languages.text: "Станция погрязла в междоусобной войне между вашими навигаторами, но это еще не все. Они напали на меня и моих спутников!"

traits.locale_text: "Станция погрязла в междуусобной войне между вашими Навигаторами, но это еще не все. Они напали на меня и моих спутников!"

languages.text: "The station was caught in an internal war between your Navigators, but that's not all. They attacked me and my companions!"
languages.original_text: "Станция погрязла в междоусобной войне между вашими навигаторами, но это еще не все. Они напали на меня и моих спутников!"

traits.locale_text: "The station was caught in an internal war between your Navigators, but that's not all. They attacked me and my companions!"
"The station was overrun with Warp aberrations, but that's not all. Your people attacked me and my companions!"
"The station was caught in an internal war between your Navigators, but that's not all. They attacked me and my companions!"
"The station was overrun with warp aberrations, but that's not all. Your people attacked me and my companions!"
"The station was caught in an internal war between your Navigators, but that's not all. They attacked me and my companions!"
"The station was caught in an internal war between your Navigators, but that's not all. They attacked me and my companions!"

languages.text: “那座星站陷入了你们导航者之间的内乱之中。不仅如此，那些人还袭击了我和我的同伴！”
languages.original_text: "The station was caught in an internal war between your Navigators, but that's not all. They attacked me and my companions!"

traits.locale_text: “那座星站陷入了你们导航者之间的内乱之中。不仅如此，那些人还袭击了我和我的同伴！”

languages.text: «La estación estaba sumida en una guerra interna entre sus Navegantes, pero eso no es todo. ¡Nos atacaron a mis acompañantes y a mí!».
languages.original_text: "The station was caught in an internal war between your Navigators, but that's not all. They attacked me and my companions!"

traits.locale_text: «La estación estaba sumida en una guerra interna entre sus Navegantes, pero eso no es todo. ¡Nos atacaron a mis acompañantes y a mí!».

languages.text: 「ステーションは航宙士の間の内紛に巻き込まれたが、問題はそれだけじゃあない。彼らは私と仲間を攻撃したのだ！」
languages.original_text: "The station was caught in an internal war between your Navigators, but that's not all. They attacked me and my companions!"

traits.locale_text: 「ステーションは航宙士の間の内紛に巻き込まれたが、問題はそれだけじゃあない。彼らは私と仲間を攻撃したのだ！」

languages.text: "Die Station war Schauplatz eines internen Krieges zwischen Euren Navigatoren, aber das ist noch nicht alles. Sie haben mich und meine Gefährten angegriffen!"
languages.original_text: "The station was caught in an internal war between your Navigators, but that's not all. They attacked me and my companions!"

traits.locale_text: "Die Station war Schauplatz eines internen Krieges zwischen Euren Navigatoren, aber das ist noch nicht alles. Sie haben mich und meine Gefährten angegriffen!"

languages.text: « La station s'est retrouvée au centre d'un conflit interne opposant vos navigateurs. Pire encore : l'on nous a attaqués, moi et mes compagnons ! »
languages.original_text: "The station was caught in an internal war between your Navigators, but that's not all. They attacked me and my companions!"

traits.locale_text: « La station s'est retrouvée au centre d'un conflit interne opposant vos navigateurs. Pire encore : l'on nous a attaqués, moi et mes compagnons ! »

languages.text: "İstasyon, sizin Rotacılarınız arasında yaşanan iç savaşın ortasındaydı. Hepsi bu kadar da değil, ben ve eşlikçilerim de saldırıya uğradık!"
languages.original_text: "The station was caught in an internal war between your Navigators, but that's not all. They attacked me and my companions!"

traits.locale_text: "İstasyon, sizin Rotacılarınız arasında yaşanan iç savaşın arasında kaldı ama hepsi bu kadar da değil. Ben ve eşlikçilerim de saldırıya uğradık!"
